title: Speciality restaurants to expand through 40-50 new outlets in the next three years
description: Speciality Restaurants, India's first publicly listed restaurant company, plans to open 40-50 new outlets in the next three years. The expansion will focus on its Mainland China and Oh! Calcutta brands, both in India and overseas. The company currently operates 97 restaurant outlets and 32 confectionery outlets.
